articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Blasts Smear Campaign of S. Korean Regime against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Blasts Smear Campaign of S. Korean Regime against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Sunday released an open statement denouncing the south Korean regime for driving the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe through a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK in violation of the agreement between the north and the south.
					 Accusing the south Korean authorities of malignant mud-slinging at the DPRK's efforts for dialogue and peace, the statement goes on:
					
					 Looking back on history, the south Korean authorities have not ceased the smear campaign against the DPRK and are still persisting in it. 
					
					 This campaign has gone on under the Park Geun Hye regime, too.
					
					 Since the outset of the year, the Park group has gotten frantic with mud-slinging, talking about "the instability of the north's social system" and "provocations." It responded to the historic New Year Address and the important proposal of the DPRK by groundlessly denying and slandering them. 
					
					 During her foreign junket on January 18, Park termed the DPRK's important proposal a "propaganda offensive" and cried out for taking a strong security posture to firmly cope with provocations against the south whenever the north launches a propaganda offensive."
					
					 At the prodding of the authorities the conservative media malignantly slandered the proposal of the north as an "appeasement gesture", "camouflaged peace offensive," "red herring for creating instability in the south" and "scheme for sparking conflict in the south."
					
					 The south Korean authorities noisily grumbled about the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear and missile force, terming it "provocation" and "violation" and calling for "sanctions".
					
					 On February 7 Park talked rubbish that "the north is still sticking to the line on simultaneously pushing forward nuclear and economic development and the situation remains unstable." She further said it seems the "north has launched a peace offensive all of a sudden these days, but the south should not slacken the vigilance even under this situation".
					
					 In a congratulatory speech made on March 6, she spoke ill of the north's above-said line and incited confrontation, asserting that it is the nukes of the north that are throwing a stumbling block in the way of economic cooperation between the south and the north."
					
					 Addressing the 3rd "nuclear security summit" held in Netherlands on March 24 she let loose provocative sophism that the settlement of the issue of the north is indispensable for building a world without nuclear weapons and it is necessary to  send a stronger message to the north urging it to dismantle its nukes."
					
					 The puppet group has never ceased its malignant smear campaign against the DPRK as regards the "Cheonan" warship sinking case.
					
					 While persisting in its madcap drills for a nuclear war, the puppet clique justified them through sheer sophism.
					
					 Late in March and at the beginning of this month they launched a large-scale joint landing drill aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" and joint air strike exercises Max Thunder designed to make air strikes at all areas of the DPRK, pushing the situation to the brink of war.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' mud-slinging has reached its height by letting loose a whole string of invectives against the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 Park let loose a torrent of malignant outbursts slandering the DPRK during her German tour in March last. She blabbered that "orphans roaming about streets are not taken care of and they are enduring hunger in the cold due to economic difficulties".
					
					 Daily NK, Chosun Ilbo and other wicked conservative media made such intolerable reckless behavior as daring slander the field guidance given by the supreme leadership of the DPRK to the baby home and orphanage and the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Espionage and intelligence organs including the Intelligence Service took away those who fled to the third country after committing crimes in the north and abandoning their parents, wives and children and are hurling them into a false propaganda against the DPRK after giving them a petty amount of money. Agents of those institutions are also taking them to foreign countries and using them as "witnesses" in their anti-DPRK smear campaign. 
					
					 The puppet group is busy hurling the human scum into the operations for scattering leaflets into areas of the north side.
					
					 The south Korean authorities can never shirk the responsibility for having pushed the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe through the above-said smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 They should be careful about their tongue wagging, bearing in mind that their mud-slinging would get them nowhere but ruin and the collapse of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persist in their smear campaign against the social system and dignity of the DPRK despite its repeated warnings and denunciation at home and abroad, they will not be able to escape the most shameful fate, cursed and censured by all Koreans.

articles.title: Inspection Group of NDC of DPRK Opens to Public Truth about Drone Case Touted by S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
Inspection Group of NDC of DPRK Opens to Public Truth about Drone Case Touted by S. Korean Authorities
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The inspection group of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK on Monday opened to public the truth about the drone case touted by the south Korean authorities, terming the fiction about the "drones sent by the north" a replica of the Cheonan warship sinking case from A to Z.
					 According to the open statement, it was reported that crashed drones were found in various parts of south Korea recently.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The south Korean military authorities on April 2 hastily announced the "results of the first investigation" in which they concluded that the drones were sent by the north. On April 11 they announced the "results of intermediary investigation" insisting that the drones "belong to the north".
					
					 They claimed those photos available from the drones are the most convincing evidence proving that the "drones belong to the north".
					
					 If one follows the south side's assertion, flying bodies coming from the north to the south and from the south to the north should belong to the north and if photos of south side areas are available from the flying bodies, all of them should belong to the north.
					
					 If then, flying bodies coming from the south to the north and from the north to the south in the areas north of the Military Demarcation Line should belong to south Korea and if photos of areas of the north side are available from the flying bodies, they should belong to south Korea. 
					
					 The "central joint inspection team" produced the writing style in the north marked on the engine battery as one of the most convincing evidence proving that the drones belong to the "north".
					
					 It is said that the front side of the engine battery of a drone at present bears the trade mark "date of kiyong (use) June 25, 2013" and "date of stop using June 25, 2014." 
					
					 They insist that this is the method of writing trade mark commonly used in the north and to write "naltsa (date)" used by south Korea as "nalja" is the writing of the north Korean style.
					
					 People in the north never use the word "kiyong" on any product. There is no explanation about the word "kiyong" in the large Korean dictionary in the north.
					
					 The recent "results of investigation" claimed that Chinese and Japanese letters are seen on the back of the battery and the device supporting the flying posture of the drones was made by Futaba of Japan.
					
					 If they assert the drones belong to the "north" as they bear Korean letters, how they will explain the Chinese and Japanese letters and Japan-made device.
					
					 Fingerprints were cited as one of the evidence proving the claim that the drones belong to the north.
					
					 If one with normal way of thinking insists that the fingerprints they claim found on the drones belong to north Koreans simply because they are not south Koreans', no one can trust the assertion.
					
					 A spokesman for the south Korean Ministry of Defense announced at the outset that "it would not be easy to find the place where the north's drone took off even if over 30 trillion won was spent out of the defense budget."
					
					 Some days later, he claimed that the take-off point of the drone was confirmed, adding that it was Onchon airfield in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Onchon airfield of the DPRK is situated in South Phyongan Province, not in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 A few days later, he corrected the take-off point of the drone announced earlier, noting that an airfield near Ongjin in South Hwanghae Province was the place where it took off.
					
					 People in the north have never heard there is an airfield near Ongjin.
					
					 The south Korean authorities cited the blue color of the drone as evidence to proving that the drones belong to the north.
					
					 They claim blue and white colors are "colors used in north Korea". Is there anyone who can agree with this?
					
					 "One cannot but construe that drones were sent by the north as it is a short distance for neighboring countries to launch  such drones and they were not launched in the south either". This is one clause of the "intermediary investigation results" which judged on the basis of the flying range that the drones were sent by the "north".
					
					 If then, do all flying bodies in the world with either short or long flying range belong to the "north"?
					
					 The south Korean Ministry of Defense on Mar. 31 claimed it confirmed those drones were launched from the area of the north side as a radar of E-8 detected a drone flying to Paekryong Island from the north.
					
					 It made a poor excuse that the south side fired at least 300 shells from Vulcan artillery pieces three times the moment the drone was detected but could not shoot down the drone flying at the altitude of 5-6 km because the maximum firing range of those guns is just 2 km.
					
					 The "central joint inspection team," as if it had forgotten  all what it had said, made public that the drone discovered on Paekryong Island crashed due to the lack of fuel, flying zigzag at the speed of 100-120 km per hour at the altitude of 1.4 km.
					
					 When public became increasingly skeptical about its announcement, the team asserted that another drone which the authorities did not know might be sent to Paekryong Island.
					
					 Besides, the south Korean authorities made the claim as evidence proving the "north's involvement" that the drones were "cast in iron mould", electronic circuit board attached to wood is not the south Korean style and there is neither witness nor informer who said  that they found a launching pad and additional equipment needed for the drone take-off in south Korea. This is the "results of the intermediary investigation" full of lies.
					
					 Seeing these ambiguous behaviors, people whisper that it was not an easy job to cook up and prove the story about the "north's involvement."
					
					 The more water flows under the bridge and the more facts are known to public, the more saliently they will bring to light truth that the story about the "north's involvement" is a sheer lie.
					
					 The open statement laid bare the sinister criminal aims sought by the south Korean authorities through the drone case:
					
					 The first aim sought by the south Korean authorities is to blame the DPRK for orchestrating the drone case and shift the responsibility for the acute north-south relations and the situation on the Korean peninsula inching close to a war on to the DPRK.
					
					 The second aim is to take the second "May 24 anti-north measure" by fabricating the second Cheonan warship sinking case in a bid to keep the north-south relations in the state of confrontation.
					
					 The third aim is to plug their American master into their arms buildup under the pretext of "strengthening the security posture" and thus make up for the "vacuum of force" and stifle the DPRK by force of arms at any cost.
					
					 It is an inveterate bad habit of the south Korean authorities to cook up shocking cases and kick up anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria by linking those cases with the DPRK whenever they are driven into a crisis.
					
					 The inspection group of the NDC has the willingness to make everything clear now that the south Korean authorities have not yet ceased floating the story about "the north's involvement" in Cheonan warship sinking case and are fabricating the second and third Cheonan cases.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to jointly investigate all cases including the Cheonan case as they claim the north was involved in them.
					
					 Security room chief of Chongwadae Kim Jang Su, who allegedly looks after "state security" of south Korea, may take part in the investigation on behalf of the south side as it will draw great attention of the nation.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have no compunction, there will be no reason whatsoever for them to shun the just and reasonable claim made by the DPRK from the very day of the occurrence of the Cheonan case.
					
					 We will wait for the south Korean authorities' response.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Monday to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senor party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, those of public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of organs and industrial establishments, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, persons of meritorious services and other people in the city, delegations of overseas Koreans, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international bodies, military attaches here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report.
					
					 He said that April 15, the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, was the day of great fortune of the nation which opened a bright future of the Korean people and the greatest holiday of mankind when they greeted the sun in the era of independence. He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung gave the origin to the Korean revolution and provided an eternal foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and making a victorious advance in the era of independence in the course of the protracted revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung, who founded the original Juche idea, comprehensively indicated the theoretical and practical issues at all stages and in all fields of the revolution and construction during the whole period of the revolutionary leadership, developing and enriching the ideological and theoretical treasure store of mankind.
					
					 He set forth the idea and line on attaching importance to the arms and the military affairs for the first time in history, providing the ever-victorious treasured sword in the cause for independence against imperialism.
					
					 He led the anti-Japanese struggle to victory to achieve the historic cause of the nation's liberation and defeated the U.S. imperialists to defend the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 He wisely led the two-stage social revolution and socialist construction, liberated the Korean people from exploitation and suppression for good and turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He developed the WPK into a revolutionary party that has achieved unity and cohesion ideologically and purposefully and an invincible party with bright future.
					
					 He made sure that the socialist power represented the independent right of the working popular masses, organized their creative ingenuity and activities, took responsibility for the livelihood of the people and protected their interests, thereby creditably discharging its mission. He developed the People's Army into a-match-for-a hundred revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 He rallied the masses close around the party and turned the whole country into a great socialist family in which they help and lead each other forward.
					
					 He set forth national reunification as the priority task of the nation and worked heart and soul for its realization. He advanced fair and reasonable principles and ways for national reunification, thereby opening up a bright prospect for national reunification.
					
					 He set forth the strategies and tactics on making the whole world independent, made sure that the cause of independence against imperialism made a dynamic advance and rendered sincere aid to the people of several countries fighting for independence, justice and peace, thus making great contributions to the cause of human emancipation.
					
					 The reporter said that the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung were creditably carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il and are being brought into full bloom under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un today.
					
					 He called upon all service personnel and people to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the eternal leaders of the WPK and the revolution for all ages and carrying forward the march of Mt. Paektu under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in provinces, cities (districts), counties and industrial complexes on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations, Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Organizations, Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with floral baskets by Japanese organizations and foreign figures on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They were the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, Kazuyoshi Hishiki, professor emeritus of Hiroshima Shudo University, Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, and Kosima Weber Liu, executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project.
					
					 He was also presented with floral baskets by the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net for the Promotion of Cultural, Scientific and Civilian Exchange and Nada Takashi, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, in congratulation of his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Secretary of C.C., WPK Meets Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Monday met and had a talk with the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea including Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: WPK Hosts Banquet in Honor of WPM
articles.content:
WPK Hosts Banquet in Honor of WPM
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) hosted a banquet in honor of the delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico (WPM) on a visit to the DPRK on Sunday.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by National Leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez.
					
					 On hand there were Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., WPK, Pak Kun Gwang, vice-department director, and other officials of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju in his speech made at the banquet recollected that the WPM is waging a positive struggle for strengthening the international unity and cooperation with the world progressive political parties.
					
					 He extended his thanks to the WPM for sending full support to the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK would make all possible efforts to further strengthen and develop in the future, too, the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPM provided in the joint struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism.
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez in his speech stressed that he extended warm greetings to supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He expressed belief that the lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for Korea's reunification would be surely realized.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people would lead a happy life in a dignified, prosperous and reunified country as soon as possible.

articles.title: SPA Presidium Hosts Reception for Participants in Art Festival
articles.content:
SPA Presidium Hosts Reception for Participants in Art Festival
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK gave a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday in honor of the participants in the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes participating in the festival.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, members of the festival organizing committee and officials concerned.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Sunday received a letter from Head of the Chinese Marathon Team Li Xiu Hua, Athletes' Representative of Germany Gunther Vogl, Athletes' Representative of South Africa Dewald Jacobus Steyn, Head of the Egyptian Marathon Team Ahmed Ibrahim Elwardani Mohamed, Head of the Madagascan Marathon Team Ramalanjaona ep Rakotondrabe Noelilaina Hantarisoa, Coach of the Chinese Taipei Marrathon Team Hsu Gi Sheng, Coach of the Rwanda Marathon Team Ndacyayisenga Jean Pierre and Coach of the Uzbekistan Marathon Team Khubbiev Radik Shavkatovich on behalf of the foreign participants in the IAAF-the 27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon.
					 The letter said:
					
					 We would like to express our heartfelt thanks to Your Excellency for inviting us to marathon which was held on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 It gave us an opportunity to know about the sports policy of the DPRK and the strong interests of its people to sports.
					
					 We were greatly impressed to see the Korean people in their dynamic struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The letter expressed belief that the Korean people would surely build a thriving socialist nation and realize the reunification of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from Ramon Jimenez Lopez, vice director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, general secretary of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, andAlhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 He was also presented with gifts in the joint name of a delegation of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun and delegation of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, in the joint name of a delegation of Kim Jong Suk Women’s Union of Russia, delegation of the Russian Society for Promoting the Study and Dissemination of Comrade Kim Jong Il’s Works, in the name of the delegation of the Society for the Study of Self－Reliance of Pakistan.
					
					 Gifts are handed over to officials concerned from them.
					
					 On the same day he received a gift from the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo.

articles.title: DPRK Government Gives Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Government Gives Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government gave a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday in honor of delegations and delegates of organizations for study of the Juche idea on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were delegations and delegates of organizations for study of the Juche idea including Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Present there were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Ki Nam, chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Co-Chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Co-Chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Monday by the co-chairman.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps, Delegations of Int'l Organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps, Delegations of Int'l Organizations
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the military attaches corps here, the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed over to Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Monday by Military Attache of the Iranian embassy Hassan Reza Husseini who is the doyen of the military attaches corps.
					
					 They were also conveyed to an official concerned by Kari Juhani Isomaa, head of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies, and Arman Mnatsakanyan, acting head of the delegation of the International Committee of the Red Cross, on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Statutes of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Pay Tribute to Statutes of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 They were members of the economic and commercial councilors corps, the Chinese embassy and the missions of WFP, UNDP and UN FAO here.
					
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues with deep reverence for the peerlessly great men who made immortal contributions to the development of the friendly relations among countries and the accomplishment of the human cause of independence, and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea arrived here on Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included a delegation of the Study Forum for Self－Reliance of Nepal headed by Chairman Subash Kaji Shrestha, delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Songchit Pullarp, delegation of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea headed by Anna Serena Bartolucci, Garth Lawrence Shelton, chairman of the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and Irina Malenko, delegate of the Irish group for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Delegation of French News Agency Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of French News Agency Arrives
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The AFP delegation headed by its Global News Director Philippe MASSONNET arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Ideological, Theoretical Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Ideological, Theoretical Exploits Praised
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un has conducted ideological and theoretical activities to carry forward and put the Juche-based idea of party building and cause on a new higher stage, bringing about a landmark occasion in developing the Korean revolution.
					 In a speech "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, he reviewed the one century-long history of Kim Il Sung's Korea and provided important guidelines indicating the way to be followed by the new century of Juche.
					
					 He published lots of works indicating orientations and ways for developing all affairs including the building of the party, state, armed forces, economy and culture in conformity with the new requirements of the times.
					
					 In his work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" he formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the eternal guiding idea of the party and revolution and proclaimed it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He published works which clarify the idea of doing all work including the party and state building the way Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il did under any circumstances and advancing the revolution and construction as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism only.
					
					 In a historic concluding speech made by him while guiding the Fourth Conference of Cell Secretaries of the WPK he clarified the great idea that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is, in essence, the popular masses-first principle.
					
					 He also published works in which he enunciated the ideas and theories on strengthening the WPK into the staff of the revolution always shining with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by deepening the work for establishing the monolithic leadership system of the WPK.
					
					 In "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" published by him on the Day of Songun in 2013, he stressed the need to carry forward with loyalty and glorify the Songun revolutionary idea and feats of Kim Jong Il forever.
					
					 The strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward  economic construction and the building of nuclear force laid down by him in his report and concluding speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the C.C., the WPK provides a sure guarantee for winning the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Stamps Issued in DPRK to Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
Stamps Issued in DPRK to Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The stamps feature Zygopetalum mackayi, Oncidium splendidum, Paphiopedilum insigne and Bletilla striata now growing at the Central Botanical Garden in the country. The plants were presented to the President as gifts by personages of different countries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Ever-Victorious Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Ever-Victorious Brilliant Commander
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Twenty-two years has passed since the title of the DPRK Generalissimo was conferred on President Kim Il Sung on April 13.
					 On this occasion, servicepersons and civilians of the country visit the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay their respects to the Generalissimo.
					
					 Seeing the star of Generalissimo engraved on the stone gate of the palace, the visitors recall the glorious history of the Songun (military-first) revolution Kim Il Sung made for the country and the people.
					
					 After setting out on the revolutionary struggle in his early years, he had regarded the idea of attaching importance to arms as the mainstay for the revolution. He declared a war against the Japanese imperialist aggressors and found the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), the first armed forces of Juche type in Korea.
					
					 The armed struggle with the formidable Japanese aggression army was a bloody war as the KPRA had to settle by its own efforts everything from drawing up lines to securing arms and bases and creating war tactics. However, Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese revolutionary war to victory, tightly taking arms, and thus accomplished the historic cause of the national liberation.
					
					 In the period of the Korean War (1950-1953) provoked by the U.S., the army and people of the DPRK shattered the myth of the "mightiness" of the U.S. imperialists under the ever-victorious command of the President. During the war he went to the front line to give confidence in sure victory to the servicepersons and unfold and command brave and adroit military operations.
					
					 So, the title of the DPRK Marshal was awarded to him, who had worked military miracles unprecedented in the world history of wars, in reflection of the unanimous demand of the army and people.
					
					 The showdown with the U.S. and its allied forces after the war had clearly shown the greatness of the President as a brilliant commander.
					
					 In the early 1960s Kim Il Sung set forth the line of simultaneously carrying on the economic construction and the defence up-building and smashed with his unique strategy and undaunted pluck every provocative move of the U.S. imperialists, arousing great admiration from among the world progressives.
					
					 Under his wise guidance, the DPRK could win in the face-off with the U.S. in the 1990s, too.
					
					 The army and people in the country conferred the title of the DPRK Generalissimo on the President representing the banner of eternal victory on the occasion of his 80th birthday.
					
					 His immortal feats for the country and the revolution will be always remembered along with the star of Generalissimo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Life Dedicated to People's Happiness
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Life Dedicated to People's Happiness
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the Day of the Sun (April 15), the birthday of President Kim Il Sung, the servicepersons and civilians in the DPRK are now recalling his whole life devoted to the people's wellbeing.
					 In his lifetime the President made ceaseless journey of field guidance to every part of the country, saying that a leader had to take pains for his people's wellbeing.
					
					 When he returned home after defeating the Japanese imperialist aggressors, he first went to visit workers at the Kangson Steel Plant, not his birthplace.
					
					 Since then, he had continued his traveling for the wellbeing of the people, regardless of rough roads and weather conditions.
					
					 In June one year he did not hesitate to walk through muddy reed marsh in tideland in Onchon County so as to solve the inhabitants' food problem.
					
					 Thanks to such devoted efforts, deserted tideland in the county turned into a fertile land.
					
					 Once he toured reed fields even under heavy rain to solve the people's clothing problem, wading through the marsh.
					
					 Such days of his field guidance included his birthdays and 2 530-odd Sundays and holidays.
					
					 In fact, his was a noble life of the people's leader, who would feel his joy at the people's happiness, regarding it as his maxim to believe in the people as in heaven.

articles.title: Co-chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Co-chairman of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Johnny Hon, co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, arrived here Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Chinese Art Performance Conducive to Deepening DPRK-China Friendship
articles.content:
Chinese Art Performance Conducive to Deepening DPRK-China Friendship
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The performance by the Eastern Song and Dance Ensemble of China is going on at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre as part of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 This is the third time for the ensemble to attend the festival.
					
					 As in the past, the ensemble put on the festival stage peculiar numbers on the DPRK-China friendship as well as traditional art pieces, leaving a deep impression on the viewers.
					
					 Typical of those numbers is a Korean folk dance "Janggu Dance". Gu Xin, head of the ensemble, told KCNA that the ensemble invited a DPRK instructor to prepare the dance and its artistes had made much effort to well represent the Korean people's customs and sentiments in the dance.
					
					 There are also serial songs "Tapestry-like Land", mainly based on such popular Korean songs as "The Flower Girl" and "Silk-weaving Girl" and played with traditional Chinese musical instrument, called urheen in Chinese.
					
					 Besides, what touched the heartstrings of audiences are Korean songs "Ardent Desire" and "Green Pine on Nam Hill", sung by singers well-known in China.
					
					 The ensemble's performance will make contribution to deepening the ties of DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Art Performance of Women's Union Celebrates Day of Sun
articles.content:
Art Performance of Women's Union Celebrates Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A performance of art groups of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea "Song of Faith of Members of Women's Union on Day of Sun" was given at the Women's Hall to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Put on the stage were numbers like choruses "Spring Holiday, Day of Sun" and "We Live under the Care of the Leader", solo and pangchang "Red Chol Pass" and dialogic poem "Real Father".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed by building an invincible socialist power on this land.
					
					 National instrumental music ensemble "Moran Hill" and folk song chorus "Song of Big Fish Haul" dealing with the motherland full of hope where the people's dreams and ideals come true made the national flavor pervade the hall.
					
					 Chorus "Forward to the Final Victory" instilled into the audience immutable truth that no one can block the Korean women and people from dynamically advancing under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Department Director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Ri Il Hwan, Chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union Kim Jong Sun, Secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK Kim Jin Ha and officials of the union and its members in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Foreign Crew Marked Day of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Crew Marked Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign crew held a meeting at Wonsan Port in Kangwon Province on Monday on the occasion of the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Prior to the meeting the participants laid bouquets before the statues of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were the captain and crew of the Panama-flagged ship Sea Star 7. Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said Kim Il Sung, the most distinguished leader in the 20th century, performed great feats on behalf of the country and people, the era and history under the unfurled banner of independence, Songun and socialism. They went on:
					
					 His idea and cause are being carried forward by Kim Jong Il who wisely led the struggle to accomplish the socialist cause.
					
					 Today the revolutionary cause of Songun is being successfully realized on a new higher stage thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, another distinguished great man.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is firmly defending the dignity of Songun Korea and leading the whole of the revolution and construction with his clairvoyant wisdom and resolute decision.
					
					 The speakers wished the Korean people greater successes in building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Favorite Song of Korean Woman in Japan
articles.content:
Favorite Song of Korean Woman in Japan
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Japan-resident Koreans attended the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival now going on here.
					 Its performance starts with the "We Sing of the Homeland" sung by Hong Ryong Wol, a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and People's Artiste of the DPRK.
					
					 Before her performance, Hong told the audience with deep emotion that she sang this song in the presence of President Kim Il Sung 40 years ago.
					
					 It was in April Juche 63 (1974) when an art troupe of Koreans from Japan gave its premiere in the presence of the President during its visit to the homeland. The President highly appreciated Hong's artistic talent, hearing her song at the performance, and invited her to visit the homeland often. And, later he saw to it that a recital for her was arranged in Japan.
					
					 Recalling the days, Hong told KCNA:
					
					 We, overseas Koreans in Japan, can never forget the deep love and trust shown by the President, who opened up a new history of the Juche-based movement of overseas compatriots and took warm care of the Korean residents in Japan. 
					
					 So, the song "We Sing of the Homeland" will be my eternal compulsory song.
					
					 My worthwhile life would have been unthinkable without care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the care of the homeland. Leader Kim Jong Il gave a banquet in honor of the Japan-resident Korean artistes staying in the homeland to attend the April Spring Friendship Art Festival held to celebrate the President's 80th birthday and personally clinked my glass of toast. 
					
					 Always remembering their love, I will sing this song forever with loyalty to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Sowing of Rice Seeds Brisk on Farms
articles.content:
Sowing of Rice Seeds Brisk on Farms
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Sowing rice seeds in seedling beds is brisk on farms across the DPRK.
					 The quotas for sowing rice seeds are being carried out at 111 percent across the country as compared with that in the same period of last year.
					
					 Officials and agricultural workers of South Phyongan Province and North Hwanghae Province have carried out their daily plans for sowing rice seeds at more than 150 percent to suit weather and water conditions.
					
					 Co-op farms in the provinces have given precedence to creating beds for rice seedlings and applied a sufficient amount of quality manure and fertilizers to them as required by Juche farming method.
					
					 Farms in North Phyongan Province and South Hwanghae Province are meticulously organizing manpower and ensuring the accurate amount of seeds per area.
					
					 Agricultural workers on the eastern coast are energetically pushing ahead with sowing seeds.
					
					 Those in North Hamgyong Province and Kangwon Province are carrying out in a substantial way the work to finish qualitatively in time the sowing of rice seeds, the first breakthrough in increasing grain output, despite unfavorable weather conditions.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Wiretapping of Other Countries
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Wiretapping of Other Countries
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is still persisting in wiretapping other countries with advanced technology.
					 The U.S. newspaper Washington Post recently reported that the U.S. National Security Agency has a technology capable of recording all phone messages in other countries and storing them for one month.
					
					 Such action in the wake of disclosed wiretapping cases has lashed the international community into anger as it is the height of human rights abuses and moral vulgarity.
					
					 Tapping a phone call is illegal. Moreover, it can not be overlooked as wiretapping against any other country means espionage.
					
					 Nevertheless, a spokesperson for the National Security Council of the White House insisted that an action is needed to cope with new threats, adding that the sustained media report about specified technology to be applied in the U.S. legitimate intelligence-gathering activities is harmful to the security of the U.S. and its allies.
					
					 This assertion shows that the U.S. is the kingpin of human rights abusers.
					
					 According to data available, the U.S. National Security Agency has eavesdropped on more than 95 percent of the world communications and photographed almost all the objects on the earth by use of satellites, with 200 000 agents, lots of spy satellites and huge-scale database. 
					
					 A budget bill of the national intelligence planning for the fiscal year 2013 showed that the U.S. had doubled the budget for its intelligence regime after the "Sept. 11 incident", turning itself into an intelligence kingdom with 107 000 members. And the U.S. intelligence budget for 2013 amounted to 52.6 billion dollars.
					
					 The cases of wiretapping by the U.S. are still now reported without letup throughout the world. The U.S. collects about two hundred millions of mobile phone messages on a daily average, including those of state leaders of different countries. In particular, more than 300 pieces of information on Germany's Chancellor Angela Merkel were reportedly gathered.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. is the kingpin of human rights abusers and an evil country that does not hesitate to encroach even upon its allies' sovereignty for its own interests.
					
					 The global electronic espionage, being conducted by the U.S., is a serious crime violating other countries' sovereignty as well as human rights.
					
					 The U.S. deserves bitter curse and condemnation by the world community for its high-handed and arbitrary practices in disregard of the elementary usage among countries and international laws.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Honored in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Honored in Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was registered as honorary chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					 A ceremony took place in Abuja on April 8 to rename the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and convey the certificate of honorary chairman to be presented to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present there were personages and members of Juche idea study organizations of Nigeria, students of Abuja University, the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria and his embassy officials.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said at the ceremony:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the guiding idea in the era of independence, as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. This is an event of great significance not only for the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea with deep insight into the requirements of the new era when the popular masses have emerged master of their destiny.
					
					  Kim Jong Il glorified and developed in depth the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 It is quite natural to make sure that the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il go by their august names.
					
					 The validity and vitality of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism have been clearly proved in the history of the DPRK shining with victory and glory.
					
					 We decided to rename the Nigerian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 It is the greatest honor and privilege of the Nigerian people to register Kim Jong Un as honorary chairman of our committee as he formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The certificate of the honorary chairman was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Nigeria at the ceremony.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Art Performance Stirs National Sentiments
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Art Performance Stirs National Sentiments
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A performance by an art troupe of Japan-resident Koreans has aroused great applauses from among the audience.
					 The performance is now given at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre as part of the 29th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					
					 Its numbers include dance "Janggu Dance" and jangsaenap solo "Thongil (reunification) Tondollari".
					
					 "Janggu Dance", performed by seven female dancers with drums, shows soft and gracious movements to the tune of various drum beatings, inciting national sentiments among the viewers.
					
					 The jangsaenap solo, too, won a great admiration of the audience for flawless rendition and peculiar tones. Jangsaenap is a traditional woodwind instrument.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet to Congratulate Kim Jong Un
Tokyo, April 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 12 to congratulate supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the front of the venue of the meeting were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. A floral basket was seen standing before them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), officials of Chongryon, compatriots and teachers and students of Korea University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report said that Kim Jong Un's reelection to the top post of the DPRK is a great national event providing a guarantee for accomplishing the cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu and a great fortune of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un achieved immortal exploits on behalf of the party, revolution, country and nation with his boundless loyalty to the great Generalissimos, rare wisdom, versatile leadership ability and noble virtues.
					
					 He made sure that the crucial proposals were made public out of his noble desire for opening a broad avenue of improving the north-south relations by the concerted efforts of Koreans and has led in the van the nation-wide struggle for bringing earlier the national reunification.
					
					 Happiness of Koreans in Japan and rosy future of the rising generations, to say nothing of the prosperity of motherland, depend on upholding and following him. 
					
					 The reporter called upon all the participants to greet the 23rd Congress of Chongryon as a meeting of loyalty, single-minded unity and inheritance and innovation and turn out in the patriotic movement for ushering in a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan, united close around Kim Jong Un with one mind and will.
					
					 A congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Meet to Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Meet to Celebrate Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary
Tokyo, April 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Hall of Culture in Tokyo on April 12 to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed above the platform of the hall was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung with the flag of the DPRK for a background. A floral basket was seen standing before it.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), officials of Chongryon, compatriots and teachers and students of Korean University.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report extended highest tribute to Kim Il Sung representing the boundless reverence of all officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of his 102nd birth anniversary.
					
					 He stressed that it is the greatest honor of the Korean people and eternal happiness of the generations to come to hold Kim Il Sung revered by the whole nation and world as the eternal leader.
					
					 He noted that the 20th century was the century which shined with the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and his personality as a great man in name and reality, adding he would be always alive as the eternal leader of the Korean people and the sun of humankind.
					
					 The reporter recalled that leader Kim Jong Il preserved and developed Chongryon, precious patriotic legacy left by Kim Il Sung, and wisely led it to steadily demonstrate its honor as a model of the movement of the world overseas Koreans.
					
					 He noted that the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining more brilliantly and the revolutionary career of the great men of Mt. Paektu is given steady continuity as the history of the Sun thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out there.
					
					 On the same day a concert was given to celebrate the 102nd birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK Will Surely Build Thriving Socialist Nation: Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Will Surely Build Thriving Socialist Nation: Swiss Organizations
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 7 on the occasion of the second anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's election to the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the state.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un was elected first secretary of the WPK on April 11, Juche 101 (2012) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK on April 13.
					
					 His election to the top posts of the party and state is an expression of the profound reverence and trust in him by the party, army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He is possessed of the same personality as a great man as President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK has performed fresh miracles over the past two years thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and held the third underground nuclear test.
					
					 It also checked and frustrated the U.S. criminal moves for a nuclear war and built a lot of structures for the people's happiness including Masikryong Ski Resort.
					
					 It further consolidated as  firm as a rock  the unity of the party and the single-minded unity of the whole society centered on Kim Jong Un by discovering and expelling the anti-party, counter-revolutionary factional clique.
					
					 The Korean people will surely accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation under the uplifted banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Celebration meetings were held in Myanmar, Bangladesh, Thailand and South Africa between April 5 and 7 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos dealing with exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also on display there were works of Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing Songun Korea. 
					
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader who founded the immortal Juche idea, built socialism centered on the popular masses on the land of the DPRK and made a contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, and other speakers highly praised Kim Il Sung as the founding father of socialist Korea, saying that progressive humankind could have a powerful ideo-theoretical weapon for national liberation and anti-imperialist struggle as he founded the Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, and Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said that they would deeply study works of Kim Il Sung, adding that the Juche idea is an original one.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, extended his highest tribute to Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years and performed immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Thailand and South Africa.

articles.title: DPRK's Holidays Marked in India
articles.content:
DPRK's Holidays Marked in India
 Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Events were held in India on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung), the 21st anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK and the 2nd anniversary of the election of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK.
					 They included a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show held by the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il and the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics in the period between April 2 and 5.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Eternal asset praising the sun".
					
					 Balzor Singh Chauhan, chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, said at the seminar that the President was a tender-hearted father of the people.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President devoted his all to the people, regarding believing in people as in Heaven as his motto in his life.
					
					 His politics of love for the people has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, noted that Kim Jong Un, who creditably inherited Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the people, is bringing the dreams and ideals of the people into realities.
					
					 Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, stressed that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as chairman of the NDC, the DPRK could smash the moves of the imperialist allied forces led by the U.S. to stifle it and provide an eternal foundation for building a thriving socialist nation despite all sorts of trials, holding aloft the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Victims of Case of People's Revolutionary Party Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Victims of Case of People's Revolutionary Party Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for the victims of the case of the People's Revolutionary Party which took place during the "yusin dictatorial regime" was held in Chilgok, North Kyongsang Province on April 9, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 At the memorial service speakers recalled that innocent people died due to the case of the People's Revolutionary Party faked up by the dictatorial regime.
					
					 The descendant of the dictator is creating fear and unrest in society today, they held, adding: The "yusin" dictatorship was revived by the chief executive to stamp out democracy.
					
					 The history of dictatorship should not be allowed to repeat itself, they said, stressing that the people would judge the authorities through the coming local election.

articles.title: Palestinian President Supports DPRK
articles.content:
Palestinian President Supports DPRK
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Mahmoud Abbas, president of Palestine, said he was pleased over the fact that the friendly relations between Palestine and the DPRK continue to develop favorably.
					 He said this when receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador to Palestine Pak Chun Il on April 10.
					
					 He hoped the party, government and the people of the DPRK will achieve successes in their efforts for building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification, meeting all sorts of challenges.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Paper
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was carried by the April issue of the Romanian paper Romania Muncitoare.
					 The work, made public on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that it is the basic principle to be adhered to in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction. It also indicates tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 It also expounds the idea on keeping patriotic stand and principle of national independence in the revolution and construction, providing the driving force and struggling against imperialism and dominationism.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's famous work "Non-aligned Information Should Contribute to the People's Cause of Independence" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house in Artyom City, Russia on April 3.
					 The work, published on June 15, Juche 82 (1993), stresses that the non-aligned movement countries and developing countries should develop the information work.
					
					 It clarifies that it is the steadfast foreign policy of the DPRK government to materialize the noble idea of the non-aligned movement and struggle for its development.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
Moscow, April 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on April 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Participants in the reception laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round works of the peerlessly great men and photos displayed under the subject of "Eternal Day of the Sun".
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Kim Yong Jae, DPRK ambassador to Russia, praised the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by founding the immortal Juche idea, building a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and further strengthening it.
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people would make a dynamic advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism full of optimism of having Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top post of the DPRK.
					
					 Kulik, director of the Asia 1 Department of the Russian Foreign Ministry, praised Kim Il Sung for establishing the Russia-DPRK friendship and performing great exploits for the opening of the good-neighborly relations between the two countries.
					
					 He wished the friendly Korean people fresh successes in their drive to attain national reconciliation and economic development and improve the people's living standard under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A performance was given there.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il published the famous work "Let Us Establish the Monolithic Ideological System More Thoroughly Throughout the Party and Society" on April 14, Juche 63 (1974). 
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the principled issues arising in establishing the party's monolithic ideological system including the issue of thoroughly preserving the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and purity of the Juche idea, the issue of strengthening the unity of the whole party centered on the leader in thought and purpose and its revolutionary cohesion and the issue of establishing a strict organizational discipline which calls on the entire party and country and all the people to act as one under the monolithic leadership of the leader.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article:
					
					 The work serves as an important one for successfully accomplishing the historic cause of modeling the party and society on the revolutionary idea of the President, the Juche idea.
					
					 The immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed in materializing the idea and cause of the leader lie in that he preserved the purity of the President's revolutionary idea and steadily developed it.
					
					 They also lie in that he markedly strengthened the unity and cohesion of the WPK and the revolutionary ranks in thinking and purpose on the basis of the revolutionary idea of the President and fully met the requirements of the President's revolutionary idea and the Juche idea in all fields of the revolution and construction.
					
					 An epochal turn was brought about  in the efforts to build a Korean-style economic power and improve the people's living standard through the drive for a great revolutionary surge for building a thriving nation and there unfolded a stirring reality in which the requirements of the Juche idea are fully met in all fabrics of social life. All this is a brilliant fruition of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership characterized by his patriotic devotion.

articles.title: Secretario de CRPP denuncia censura de Sur de Corea contra RPDC
articles.content:
Secretario de CRPP denuncia censura de Sur de Corea contra RPDC
　Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico el dia 13 la nota abierta para revelar el verdadero aspecto de las autoridades surcoreanas que llevan a la fase catastrofica las relaciones Norte-Sur recurriendo a la difamacion perversa contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a contrapelo del acuerdo de ambas partes coreanas.
					  El documento revela la vil calumnia de las autoridades surcoreanas a los esfuerzos por el dialogo y la paz de la RPDC como sigue:
					
					  Historicamente las autoridades surcoreanas nunca dejaron de censurar a la RPDC y hasta la fecha han seguido perpetrandolo atrozmente.
					
					  Desde los primeros dias de este ano la banda de "poder" de Park Geun-hye ha recurrido a la censura disparateando sobre la "inestabilidad del sistema y la provocacion del Norte " y respondio al historico mensaje del Ano Nuevo y la propuesta importante de la RPDC con la negacion y la denigracion.
					
					  El dia 18 de enero en que estaba de visita al extranjero Park ordeno "mantener la perfecta disposicion segura frente a la provocacion del Norte" acusando la propuesta importante de la RPDC de "ofensiva de propaganda".
					
					  Bajo la instigacion de las autoridades los medios de prensa conservadores censuraron perversamente que la propuesta del Norte es el "gesto de apaciguamiento", "ofensiva de paz disfrazada", "desviacion de la inquieta opinion publica interna" y "para el conflicto dentro del Sur".
					
					  Y acusan las fuerzas armadas nucleares y las de misiles de autodefensa de la RPDC de "provocacion" y "violacion" abogando por la "sancion" contra el Norte.
					
					  El 7 de febrero, Park dijo que "El Norte sigue manteniendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo de las fuerzas armadas nucleares y la economia y sigue inestable la situacion del Norte" y "en estos dias el Norte fingen tomar de repente la ofensiva de paz, pero no hay que relajar la vigilancia precisamente en este tiempo."
					
					  El 6 de marzo, en el supuesto mensaje de felicitacion, dijo que el obstaculo principal que impide la cooperacion economica entre el Sur y el Norte es precisamente las armas nucleares del Norte" calumniando la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la RPDC e inculcando la confrontacion.
					
					　  En la III "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear", efectuada el 24 de marzo en Holanda, solto los disparates provocativos tales como "es imprescindible resolver el problema nuclear del Norte de Corea para construir el mundo sin armas nucleares" y "es necesario enviar al Norte de Corea el mensaje mas fuerte para que este renuncie sus armas nucleares". 
					
					　En cuanto al incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", los titeres surcoreanos siguen calumniando a la RPDC. 
					
					　En tanto, libran con frenesi los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC justificandolos con  pretextos injustos.
					
					　Desde finales de marzo y hasta abril desarrollan los ejercicios conjuntos de desembarco de gran envergadura con la meta de "conquistar Pyongyang" y el simulacro conjunto aereo "Max Thunder" para asestar el ataque aereo contra toda la extension norcoreana llevando la situacion al borde de la guerra. 
					
					　La demagogia de las autoridades surcoreanas llega al climax con las calumnias a la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					　Durante su visita a Alemania realizada en marzo pasado, Park Geun-hye dijo que "por la crisis economica, los huerfanos norcoreanos estan vagabundeando en las calles y sufren por el frio y el hambre". 
					
					　Daily NK, Chosun Ilbo y otros recalcitrantes medios de prensa conservadores tambien cuestionaron atrevidamente la visita de orientacion de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC a hospicio y orfanato y las elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, lo cual es un intolerable insulto a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC. 
					
					　El Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia y otros organos intrigantes de inteligencia lanzan a la demagogia anti-RPDC a los fugitivos norcoreanos secuestrados al Sur de Corea que tras haber cometido delitos en la patria se huyeron a un tercer pais abandonando hasta a sus familiares, dandoles un punazo de dinero y presentandoles como "testigos" hasta en la escena internacional. 
					
					　Los titeres surcoreanos recrudecen el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC hacia la parte norcoreana instigando a las escorias humanas.
					
					　Las autoridades surcoreanas no pueden liberarse jamas de la culpabilidad de haber llevado a la fase catastrofica las relaciones intercoreanas con las calumnias a la RPDC. 
					
					　Las autoridades surcoreanas deben cuidarse con su boca teniendo presente que la demagogia anti-RPDC traera solo el arruinamiento de si mismas y la ruptura de los vinculos Norte-Sur. 
					
					　Si siguen recurriendo a las calumnias al regimen y dignidad de la RPDC, pese a las reiteradas advertencias y denuncias del interior y exterior, ellas seran repudiadas y rechazadas por toda la nacion y no podran eludir el destino mas vergonzoso.

articles.title: Tiene lugar ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC con motivo del 15 de abril
articles.content:
Tiene lugar ceremonia de juramento de oficiales y soldados del EPC con motivo del 15 de abril
 Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, tuvo lugar el dia 13 en la explanada frente al Palacio del Sol Kumsusan la ceremonia de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito popular de Corea para rendir homenaje a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y jurar la fidelidad al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un.
					 A la ocasion asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, los funcionarios del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y los comandantes del EPC.
					
					 Los participantes rindieron homenaje postumo a los Generalisimos ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					 Pronuncio el discurso de la ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					 Choe dijo que con motivo del Dia del Sol, todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC rinden a los Generalisimos el mas sublime homenaje deseandoles la eternidad.
					
					 Subrayo que gracias a la destacada direccion de los Generalisimos sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea, nacidas en la selva del monte Paektu, vienen encauzando la revolucion coreana defendiendo de siglo en siglo el partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo y gracias a la extraordinaria inteligencia y larga prevision de ellos, se ha preparado la garantia de prosperidad eterna de la nacion.
					
					 Prosiguio que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las hazanas de los Generalisimos que con sus excepcionales actividades ideologicas y teoricas y sabia direccion, abrieron la epoca del Juche, la del Songun, y dedicaron su vida entera a la sagrada causa revolucionaria por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					 Expreso la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de todos los uniformados de defender consecuentemente las hazanas de los Generalisimos realizadas por la construccion del ejercito, consolidar la unidad monolitica de todo el ejercito teniendo al Mariscal como unico centro de unidad y direccion y garantizar con el fusil la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en Paektu.
					
					 Los participantes gritaron consignas reflejando la conviccion y voluntad de glorificar la historia revolucionaria del Songun de los Generalisimos y sus hazanas y defender a ultranza con el fusil al Comandante Supremo.
					
					 A continuacion, tuvo lugar el desfile de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y los estudiantes de las academias de todos niveles y los alumnos de las escuelas revolucionarias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot anti-RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia complot anti-RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los delegados-jefes de las conversaciones a 6 bandas de Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea discutieron en Washington sobre la "sancion mas dura" a traves del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en el caso de que surja la "provocacion adicional" de alguien, cuestionando "cuarta prueba nuclear" y la "provocacion de misiles" de esta.
					 Esto es una conspiracion criminal encaminada a arrebatar el derecho de un estado soberano con la sancion internacional y la presion militar y a aplastar y aislar a toda costa la RPDC.
					
					 Asi subraya el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 13 y continua:
					
					 Frente a las maniobras belicas de EE.UU. y los titeres del Sur de Corea para agredir a la RPDC, esta tomo las medidas de autodefensa inclusive el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para defender la patria y el socialismo y salvaguardar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, lo que es sumamente justo.
					
					 Estas "conversaciones tripartitas" son imperdonable desafio a la RPDC y una aventura peligrosisima que lleva a la fase catastrofica la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Los yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos deben responsabilizarse de todas las consecuencias que emanen de sus imprudentes actos anti-RPDC.
